channel.title: [C4D] Pen
channel.description:
[center]Just a quickish whip up in cinema 4d. Took around 30 - 45 minutes to complete.
[IMG]http://img145.imageshack.us/img145/8327/pensq8.jpg[/img]
#1 http://img261.imageshack.us/img261/2530/penrj6.jpg[/center]

item.title: [C4D] Pen
item.dc:creator: @Unhandled Unhandled
item.description:
@Unhandled wrote:

Zameix:

Right, I know you would like to show off your spectacular vocabulary but what you said has nothing to do with me requesting people to stop hijacking my thread with there own pictures

If you didn’t want others to post, then you shouldn’t have created a thread.

Zameix:

On the other hand, Unhandled if you’d be willing to help me out perhaps a 1 to 1 explaining to me the method & tools you used to create the pen.

No.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Pen
item.dc:creator: @Zameix Zameix
item.description:
@Zameix wrote:

[quote=“magma, post:1, topic:235491”][quote author=Zameix link=topic=310324.msg2477963#msg2477963 date=1223362508]
Not to be rude but could everyone please remove images that don’t need to be in the thread.
[/quote]I think you’ll find that the images correspond to the text included in the post.[/quote]

Right, I know you would like to show off your spectacular vocabulary but what you said has nothing to do with me requesting people to stop hijacking my thread with there own pictures

On the other hand, Unhandled if you’d be willing to help me out perhaps a 1 to 1 explaining to me the method & tools you used to create the pen.

item.title: [C4D] Pen
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:2, topic:235303”]I swear to god I have seen this EXACT same pen or image in this forum before.

On Topic: Doesn’t look very much like a pen at all. It looks like a render of one. Try to make it realistic at least.[/quote]

Ya, it has been posted like 2-3 times.
It’s on one of those tutorial sites.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Pen
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Zameix, post:16, topic:235303”][quote author=Frell link=topic=310324.msg2477260#msg2477260 date=1223328261]

I need to familiarise myself with the tools more I think.

Now we are getting somewhere.

Use a cube, have it editable, and just click on the side and it will turn orange, then drag a texture to it.
[/quote]

I was half way there. I made it editable and tried deleting the front side but when I did, it also deleted the top one. Dilemma![/quote]
make sure they both werent selected.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Zameix Zameix

I need to familiarise myself with the tools more I think.
[/quote]
Now we are getting somewhere.

Use a cube, have it editable, and just click on the side and it will turn orange, then drag a texture to it.[/quote]

item.description:

Zameix:

I need to familiarise myself with the tools more I think.

Now we are getting somewhere.

Use a cube, have it editable, and just click on the side and it will turn orange, then drag a texture to it.

item.title: [C4D] Pen
item.dc:creator: @Zameix Zameix
item.description:
@Zameix wrote:

Getting overly frustrated right now trying to do this cornell box. I need to familiarise myself with the tools more I think, but for future reference how do you make each side of a cube it’s own like plane. So seperate materials can be added and sides can be deleted.

Read full topic

had to try that box thing loll. I should have used VRay for it though

item.title: [C4D] Pen
item.dc:creator: @Zameix Zameix
item.description:
@Zameix wrote:

I wish I knew what or how to do that, but I don’t.

brb google.

item.title: [C4D] Pen
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Use a box…
LOL.

Make a box. Invert the normals. Delete the front one. And split them all. Then you can texture each one individually.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Pen
item.dc:creator: @Zameix Zameix
item.description:
@Zameix wrote:

I tell you what I’ve been trying for around 35 minutes to even make this damn box, i’m sure there must be an easier way than using planes because I can’t get them vertical and in the correct place etc.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Pen
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Well they use them IRL a lot to test a bunch of shit like lights and stuff.
But for rendering they’re used for the same thing and more, like materials and stuff. Kinda like a showcase sometimes too.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Pen
item.dc:creator: @Zameix Zameix
item.description:
@Zameix wrote:

Ok, so what’s the use of the Cornell Box?

And i’ll give that a shot now.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Pen
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Yes it’s not that you misunderstood it’s that you didn’t know.
I’ll find one.

OK CORNELL BOX that’s what it was.

CornellBox1.png512×512

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Pen
item.dc:creator: @Zameix Zameix
item.description:
@Zameix wrote:

Ofc he’s better i’m just following tuts as it goes. Fastbawlz has been using the software longer than myself and in WHAT way does it remind you of a dildo?

tbh i’m not sure if that’s a good comment or not.

And STH I’ll give that a go. I’m not sure where you’re going with that but i’ll try ;).

EDIT:

STH don’t laugh if i completely misunderstood what you ment, and I have no idea why you asked me to do this but… here I go.

Read full topic

item.title: [C4D] Pen
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

I’ll try lol. sometimes I think I’m being harsh but if I wasn’t nobody here would learn.

This stuff is like the EXACT stuff I did when i first started so. I can’t hope for TOO much more lol.

If you’re going to do something as simple as a box, do one of those scientific boxes.

God the name is escaping me right now. It’s for studies. Yellow red and green sides with white on top and a light in the top.

Read full topic

item.description:
